descriptions.NAME: PrintItem
descriptions.DESCRIPTION: Displays your actions in the debug console

descriptions.NAME: Burning Circle
descriptions.DESCRIPTION: Attacks create a damage area dealing {0}% damage to close enemies

descriptions.NAME: Resdidual Enmbers
descriptions.DESCRIPTION: Repeats attacks after {1}s, dealing {0}% damage

descriptions.NAME: Magmatic Coating
descriptions.DESCRIPTION: Increase critical strike chance by {0}%

descriptions.NAME: Fiery Alloy
descriptions.DESCRIPTION: Increase damage by {0}%

descriptions.NAME: Voracious Flames
descriptions.DESCRIPTION: Successive attacks deal {0}% additionnal damage

descriptions.NAME: Obsidiaon Shard
descriptions.DESCRIPTION: Killing an enemy shots 1 projectile dealing {0}% damage to the nearest enemy

descriptions.NAME: Focus Amber
descriptions.DESCRIPTION: Increase bullet time duration by {0}%

descriptions.NAME: Power Saver
descriptions.DESCRIPTION: Leaving bullet time without using any attack or movement restores {0}% energy

descriptions.NAME: Heart of the Storm
descriptions.DESCRIPTION: Killing an enemy restores {0}% additionnal energy

descriptions.NAME: Battery Pack
descriptions.DESCRIPTION: Increases maximal energy by {0}

descriptions.NAME: Overcharged Coil
descriptions.DESCRIPTION: Activating bullet time deals {0}% damage to all enemies

descriptions.NAME: Impenetrable Roots
descriptions.DESCRIPTION: When on the ground, reduce all damage taken by {0}%

descriptions.NAME: Hardening Plates
descriptions.DESCRIPTION: Killing an enemy grants a {0}s invulnerability

descriptions.NAME: Stone Armor
descriptions.DESCRIPTION: Increase max HP by {0}

descriptions.NAME: Horn of Plenty
descriptions.DESCRIPTION: Finishing a room restore {0}% of max HP.

descriptions.NAME: Sylvan Breastplate
descriptions.DESCRIPTION: Reduce all damage taken by {0}

descriptions.NAME: Clay Clone
descriptions.DESCRIPTION: Upon death, resurrect with 100% HP

descriptions.NAME: Lightness
descriptions.DESCRIPTION: Increase dashing speed by {0}%

descriptions.NAME: Artificial Wings
descriptions.DESCRIPTION: Increase max amount of dash by {0}

descriptions.NAME: Rift Maker
descriptions.DESCRIPTION: Landing creates a rift, increasing dashing speed by {0}%

descriptions.NAME: Invisibility Cloak
descriptions.DESCRIPTION: Dashing or redirecting grants a{0}s invulnerability
